projects.description: This project will create a random quote and print it to the screen. Its purpose was to practice object literals, how functions work and to use eventlisteners.

A fun DOM manipulation project. In many applications we need to work with lists and filter those lists. In this project I have written logic that creates pagination links. And shows 10 students per page.
In this project, I haved used JavaScript to enhance an interactive registration form for a fictional conference called 'FullStack Conf.'

I created a browser-based, word guessing game: 'Phrase Hunter.' I've use JavaScript and OOP (Object-Oriented Programming) to select a random, hidden phrase. A player tries to guess the phrase by selecting individual letters from an onscreen keyboard. Can they guess the phrase before they run out of attempts?

Many sites — Twitter, Facebook, IMDB, and Wikipedia to name a few — offer a vast sea of data that you can access and display on your own web pages. I've used JavaScript, to create an employee directory by communicating with a third-party API (Application Programming Interface).
